title: Project Display Name
description: Brief 2-3 sentence description for project card. Focus on what the project does and the main problem it solves.
longDescription: Detailed 3-5 sentence description for project modal. Include technical details, key features, and impact or results achieved.
liveUrl: https://project-demo.com (optional, use null if not available)
outcomes: Specific achievement with metrics (e.g., Achieved 95% accuracy)
Performance improvement (e.g., Reduced processing time by 50%)
Recognition or ranking (e.g., Top 10% in competition)
Publication or presentation (e.g., Published at ACM Conference)
